description: American airstrikes in Farah Province, Afghanistan, last week caused what officials and human rights workers are calling the worst episode of civilian casualties in eight years of war.
title: Recovering From the Airstrikes
title_page: Recovering From the Airstrikes - The New York Times
text:
The number of civilians killed by the American airstrikes last week in Granai, Afghanistan, may never be fully known. "We were very nervous and afraid and my mother said, 'Come quickly, we will go somewhere and we will be safe,' " said Tillah, 12, from her hospital bed.
Joao Silva for The New York Times
